items.title: James Gunn Addresses Potential DCU Flash Movie As He Reiterates His No. 1 Rule For Greenlighting New Projects
items.description: DC Studios boss James Gunn addresses the potential for a new Flash movie set within the DCU, reiterating his number 1 rule for greenlighting projects.

items.title: Nicholas Hoult Reveals The X-Rated Gift He Received From Nosferatu Director After Filming
items.description: Nicholas Hoult reveals the bizarre yet fitting gift he received from Nosferatu director Robert Eggers after filming wrapped for the gothic remake.

items.title: Jean Grey's New Casting Update Makes My Perfect MCU X-Men Future Even More Likely
items.description: Reports of a Stranger Things star's possible casting as Jean Grey in the MCU has me hopeful that Marvel will be handling the new X-Men team very well.
